Key:
(It's too much work to find somewhere to eat,
so I guess I'll just eat in the classroom today.)

(Come to think of it, I forgot to give Tohka
her lunch.)
Hey Tohka.
Hm? What is it?

Here ya go, your lunch. This is the most
important time of day for you, right?

Hey! The most important time of day is when
I'm with you, Shido! Not lunch!
Oh!

A-About what I said—! It's the truth, got it?!
I was only stating the obvious; not expecting
anything from it!
Nuuuu!

T-Tohka! Don't say any more! Things will
only get more complicated!
Huh?! O-Oh...
J-Just calm down... Let's eat our lunch, okay?
O-Okay.

Oh no. I've dropped my lunch. I can't eat it
anymore. How unfortunate. No more lunch
for me. Big problem.

O-Origami! Are you okay? I'll give you some of
my lunch. Do you want to eat with us?
I will do that. Thank you, Shido.
O-Origami Tobiichi! You did that on purpose.

Unfounded accusations. What an unfortunate
soul. Only a twisted heart makes twisted
matters from such an innocuous thing.
WHAT?! Did you call me an unfortunate soul?!

A rotten apple spoils the barrel. Shido, if you
continue to associate with Tohka Yatogami, we
will become unfortunate souls as well. Be warned.
Well, um—
GRRRR! You set me up, Origami Tobiichi!
(ARGH! WHY DOES THIS ALWAYS HAPPEN?!)

T-Tohka-chan, calm down! Okay? Here,
why don't we... all eat together?
*grunt* I-If you say so, Rinne...
Tobiichi-san, what do you think?
I don't mind. If Shido wishes it.
Yes. I think that's a great idea!

Oh, what a relief! Let's all put our desks
together and eat! Come on.
Phew... That was a close one. Thanks, Rinne.
You're welcome.

Hehe. I guess being too popular has its
downside.
Hm? Did you say something?
Nothing at all... Hehe.

Hey Origami, feel free to take anything you
want from my lunch.

Oh, Tobiichi-san, I don't know if you'd like it,
but you can also eat from my lunch as well.
No need. I'm just fine with Shido's lunch.
O-Oh, really...?

I don't think I've got enough food here.
Don't be shy, take some from Rinne.
If you say so, Shido.
Here you go, Tobiichi-san.
W-Wait!
Hm?

Goodness. Very well, Origami Tobiichi...
Y-You can have some of mine, too...
T-Tohka...?
...Is it poisoned?

Goodness! Wh-Who would poison you!
I was trying to be courteous like Rinne!
Huh? Like me?

Never mind! I-I was just being kind, okay?!
So just shut up, and take some!

Origami, Tohka insists, so why don't you
take some from her. I think indulging her
might be enough.
If you say so, Shido.
Uh huh.
